title: If sunlight kills coronavirus, why not try UV lamps? - Local News 8
content: UV lamps should not be used to sterilize hands or other areas of skin as UV radiation can cause skin irritation,” WHO says. “You can catch COVID-19, no matter how sunny or hot the weather is.
warning: Based on the content, title, language and advertisements on this page, it can be assumed that this page is credible!
